title: Getting Started with SpNeigh
text: SpNeigh package provides flexible interpretable framework analyzing spatial neighborhoods high-resolution spatial transcriptomics data. Designed support technologies 10x Xenium, Vizgen MERFISH, 10x Visium HD, SpNeigh facilitates range region-aware distance-aware analyses. Key features include boundary detection, spatial weight calculation based proximity structural landmarks (e.g., region centroid boundary), spatially-informed differential expression testing using spline-based modeling, visualization local cellular interactions. integrating spatial geometry transcriptomic profiles, SpNeigh helps uncover biologically meaningful spatial patterns, boundary-enriched genes, spatial gradients, intercellular interactions, enabling deeper insights tissue organization cellular communication. vignette demonstrates key functionalities SpNeigh R package using real 10x Xenium Fresh Frozen Mouse Brain Tiny Subset Dataset. show : Identify spatial boundaries neighboring ring regions Explore spatial interaction patterns clusters Perform different expression analysis two cell populations Compute spatial weights boundary centroid proximity Perform spatial differential expression analysis along spatial gradients Perform spatial enrichment analysis along spatial gradients workflow highlights analytical flexibility biological insights enabled SpNeigh.
